name: EXCELsior
description:
I've made this game in order to prove the concept that is possible to create a game within Microsoft Excel tool.

This game was build using only Excel features, like Formulas and mostly VBA code.

It is a simple Turn Base combat where you choose your equipment and distribute attribute points before the battle. Choose one among three enemies to fight!

Since it's just an alpha development project, it has A LOT to enhance and features to be added. So if you try not too hard you might broke it.
